text: Emir Hazretleri, Ertuğrul uç beyimizi esir edip...

text: Tuğtekin Bey ve Sungur Tekin bir olup askerlerimle beni derdest ettiler.
english: Tugtekin Bey and Sungur Tekin teamed up and captured me and my soldiers.

text: Evet Emir Hazretleri. Üçü bir olmuşlardı. Gümüştekin Bey'imizin de...
english: Yes, Your Highness. The three of them had become one.
They said that Mr. Gümüştekin and you too were traitors.

text: Demek sonunda devlete isyan ettiler ha?
english: So they finally rebelled against the state, huh?
Gather your soldiers. We are going to Kayı Tribe's village. Yes sir, please

text: Korkut Bey'le kan bağım olmadığı için...
english: Because I have no blood relation with Korkut Bey...

text: ...iki obanın beyleri beni mahkemenin başına getirdiler Gümüştekin Bey.
english: ...the chieftains of the two tribes appointed me to head the court, Gümüştekin Bey. All

text: Tek istediğimiz adalettir. Bunu böyle belleyesin.
english: we want is justice. Remember this. None
of you have the right to judge me .
this makeshift court you've set up...

text: ...adalet değil, Ertuğrul'un fitnelerinin galip geleceğini bilirim.
english: ...not justice, but Ertuğrul's machinations will prevail.

text: Ne bu mahkemeyi ne de bu mahkemenin vereceği kararı tanımayacağım.
english: I will not recognize this court, nor will I recognize any decision it makes.
You should remember it this way too. The

text: Mahkeme başlayacaktır. Söyleyeceğin varsa yargılanırken söylersin.
english: trial will begin. If you have something to say, say it during the trial. Please
sit down. I will never kneel

text: Hiç kimsenin huzurunda diz çökmem ben.

text: Ol deyince olduran, gönüllerimizi imanla dolduran...

(Music - Suspense) Goncagül learned from Ishak Derviş that

english: Selcan went alone to collect medicinal mushrooms...

text: Peki, sonra ne oldu Hayme Hatun?
english: So, what happened to Hayme Hatun next?
Aytolun and Goncagül have been following my daughters-in-law. I

text: Yanıma Abdurrahman Alp'i alıp ben de peşlerinden gittim.
english: took Abdurrahman Alp with me and followed them . I found them attempting to

text: Gelinlerimi öldürmeye teşebbüs ederken buldum onları.

english: My brother and my daughter are innocent.

text: Ben de Aytolun'u öldürtmek zorunda kaldım.
english: I was forced to have Aytolun killed, too.

text: Ya sen Selcan Hatun, Goncagül Hatun'u kaçarken takip ettiğini söyledin.
english: Selcan Hatun, you said you followed Goncagül Hatun when she was fleeing.

text: Onu yakaladım. Hançeriyle beni öldürmek istedi. Ben de kendimi korudum.
english: I caught him. He tried to kill me with his dagger . I defended myself too.

text: Lakin sonra elimden kaçtı. Söyleyeceklerim bundan ibarettir.
english: But then it slipped from my grasp. That's all I have to say. What happened when
...and Gümüştekin Bey, along with their soldiers, captured Ertuğrul Bey...

text: ...ve Banı Çiçek'i yakaladığında ne oldu? Bir de senden dinlemek isterim.
english: ...and Banı Çiçek? I'd like to hear it from you too. As

text: Ertuğrul Bey'le Tuğtekin Bey'in de anlattığı gibi her şeyi inkâr etti.
english: Ertuğrul Bey and Tuğtekin Bey also recounted, he denied everything.

text: Lakin biz adalet istediğimiz için onu obaya...
english: But because we sought justice, we brought him to the tribe...
...before the lords. The decision rests with your court. Do you have anything to

text: Bir diyeceğin var mı Gümüştekin Bey?

english: ...may you all get what you deserve.
You will be held accountable for this. You will give it. Do

text: Senin bir diyeceğin var mı Ertuğrul Bey?
english: you have anything to say, Ertuğrul Bey?
I wish I had killed him sooner.

text: Bu işin bir ucu da başka kimselere gider Artuk Bey.
english: This matter will lead to other people as well, Mr. Artuk.

text: Gümüştekin Bey'in suçu sabittir. Mahkemenin huzurunda...
english: Mr. Gümüştekin's guilt is established. I request that you give him one more opportunity to confess before the court that
he committed his murders under the influence of Saadettin Köpek

text: ...itiraf etmesi için bir fırsat daha verilmesini isterim sizden.
english: . By exposing a traitor who is

text: Devletimizi içeriden çürüten bir haini ifşa ederek...
...ölmeden önce hayırlı bir iş yapmış olur.
english: ...he will have done a good deed before he dies. Is

text: Doğru mu bu Gümüştekin? İtiraf edecek misin?
english: this true, Gümüştekin? Will you confess?
will not succumb to your lies, Ertuğrul.
I will not bend. It's not just you...

text: ...senin yalanlarına ortak olan bütün bu beyler...
english: ... all those gentlemen who were complicit in your lies...

text: Emir Saadettin sana kanan bütün bu ahmaklardan da bunun hesabını soracak.
english: Emir Saadettin will also hold all these fools who believed you accountable.
absolutely no fear of any of you.
You will be held accountable for this. You will give it.

text: Konur Alp oğlu Gümüştekin, tanıkların beyanlarından yola çıkılarak...
english: Konur Alp oğlu Gümüştekin, based on the statements of the witnesses...
...has been found guilty. It has been proven that you committed these murders together with

text: Aytolun Hatun ve Goncagül Hatun'la bir olup...

english: . You're going to get what's coming to you

text: Tuğtekin Bey, senin infaz için bir diyeceğin var mıdır?
english: Mr. Tugtekin, do you have anything to say about the execution?

text: İnfazın Ertuğrul Bey tarafından yapılmasını isterim.
english: I would like the execution to be carried out by Ertuğrul Bey.

text: (Tuğtekin) İki obanın da şerefini o kurtarmıştır.
english: (Tugtekin) He saved the honor of both tribes.
I want to see his eyes when he dies.

text: (Artuk) Alpler, suçluyu infaz için otağın önüne götürün.
english: (Artuk) Alps, bring the criminal to the front of the tent for execution.
(Gümüştekin) Don't believe these lies. Don't believe it.
Don't be a tool for Ertuğrul's slanders.

text: Aytolun Hatun da kızım da masumdurlar.
english: Aytolun Hatun and my daughter are both innocent.
They shed the blood of innocents. They killed my brother.

text: Emir Saadettin bunların hepsinin hesabını sizlerden soracak.
english: Emir Saadettin will hold you all accountable for this.
I am your front-line brain. Don't do it!

text: Uç beyini öldürenlerin hepsinden hesap sorulacaktır.
english: Those who killed the mastermind will all be held accountable.
You will all suffer at the hands of the state.
All of you. All of you.

text: Sen Allah katında vereceğin hesabı düşün Gümüştekin Bey.
english: Think about the reckoning you will have to give before God, Mr. Gümüştekin.
I issue this order in the name of our Sultan Alaeddin Keykubat.
...put that sword back in its place.

text: Uç beyim hakkındaki asılsız iddiaları öğrenmek...
english: learn about the baseless allegations against my boss...

text: ...ve gerçeği açığa çıkartmak için geldim buraya.
İki obanın beyleri senin uç beyini değil...
english: The chieftains of the two tribes judged not your border lord... ...but the murderer of

english: Korkut Bey and Duru Hatun . He
(Hayme) Emir Saadettin Köpek. I heard with my own ears that

english: Aytolun and Goncagül killed Korkut Bey and his wife Duru Hatun...
So, what are you accusing Gümüştekin of?
He used his brother and his daughter.

text: Cinayetleri uç beyi olmak için işledi.
english: He committed the murders to become a warlord. He used

text: Kayıları ve Dodurgaları kendi emellerine alet etmek için kullandı.
english: the Kayı and Dodurga tribes to further his own ambitions.
Do you have proof, Mr. Ertuğrul?

text: Ben de tanıklık ederim Emir Saadettin.
english: I will also testify, Emir Saadettin.
Lie. It's all a lie, Emir Saadettin. He poisoned both

text: Hayme Hatun'u da Tuğtekin Bey'i de yalanlarıyla zehirledi.
english: Hayme Hatun and Tuğtekin Bey with his lies. It's

english: Now I will take both Ertuğrul and Gümüştekin to the caravanserai.
I will question them there. It is

text: Gerçeği ortaya çıkarmak benim boynumun borcu olsun.
english: my duty to uncover the truth.

text: Aksi takdirde her iki obanın da beyleri...
english: Otherwise, in my eyes, the chieftains of both tribes would have rebelled against

text: Eh ben de gereğini yapmakta tereddüt etmem.
english: Well, I won't hesitate to do what's necessary.

text: Kendi kuyunu kazdın Ertuğrul. Kendi kuyunu kazdın.
english: You dug your own grave, Ertuğrul. You dug your own grave.

text: Yusuf'un yolunda kuyuda ölmekten korkmayız Elhamdülillah.
english: We are not afraid to die in the well, following in the footsteps of Joseph, Alhamdulillah.
I'm telling you for the first time, Ertuğrul.
Now, if you want, you can take the brains out of the woodwork. Don't

text: Sanma ki bunun hesabını vermeyeceksin Ertuğrul.
english: think you'll get away with this, Ertuğrul.

text: Bundan gayrı devlet düşmanına ne reva görülüyorsa...

...will be deemed appropriate for you as well.
Shame on you all. Shame on you all
Fear the wrath of the state. Once
you enter your tents, you will forget about peace...
...and once you lie down on your beds, you will forget about sleep. Those
who forgot their loyalty to the state's command...
...those who pledged allegiance to this scoundrel Ertuğrul...
... I saw a fear in your eyes that I have never seen before. A fear I had never seen

text: Bu korku bin yıllık devlet sevginizden.

text: Emir-ül Emir'e itaatten gelir, bunu bilirim.

...you should not be afraid of this worthless Emir. Don't lose heart.

text: Çünkü siz her daim devletinizin yanında oldunuz.

text: Saadettin Köpek iki obanın da peşine düşmeyecektir.

text: İtibarını korumak için tedbirler alacağı belli.
english: It's clear he will take measures to protect his reputation.

text: Bu olayın üstünü örtecektir. Obalarımızı değil beni düşman belleyecektir.
english: This will cover up the incident. They will consider me, not our tribes, as their enemy. That's exactly what

text: Senin istediğin de buydu zaten beyim.
O da tıpkı Gümüştekin gibi tuzak kurdukça batacaktır.
english: Gümüştekin, the more traps he sets, the deeper he will sink.

text: Beyim, yalnız bilmeni isterim ki gayrı Gündoğdu Bey'imin başalpliği bitmiştir.
english: My lord, I just want you to know that Gündoğdu Bey's term as chief commander has come to an end.
What do you say, Mr. Artuk?
His condition is not good. We are obliged to do what is necessary

text: Obalarımızın selameti için gereğini yapmak mecburiyetindeyiz.
english: for the safety of our communities .

text: Ben vakti zamanı gelince Hayme Hatun'a anlatacaktım.
english: I was going to tell Hayme Hatun when the time was right.
But I wanted you to know first.
My lord, know that you will not be alone.
Thank you, Mr. Artuk, thank you. Shall we begin,

text: Abla, abla, abla, sakin olasın abla.
english: Sister, sister, sister, calm down, sister. A
little patience. It will pass. A little patience.
Mr. Gümüştekin, I swear to God… I will not let those who
did this to you get away with it .

text: Gözün arkada kalmasın beyim. İntikamınızı alana dek…
english: n't worry, sir. Until I have avenged you… I will not allow

Come here, Mr. Tugtekin. What's wrong?

text: Goncagül’ün peşinden giden Alpler geri döndü.
english: The Alps who were following Goncagül have returned.
They couldn't find any trace of him. He has nowhere to
run. It will definitely be found.
The Alps will continue the search.

text: Hayme Ana, o avrat nefes aldığı sürece benim içim rahat etmeyecektir.
english: Hayme Ana, as long as that woman is breathing, I will not have peace of mind.
What will you do, Turgut? Welcome,

text: Turalı yarın Alpliğe ilk adımını atacak.
english: Turali will take his first step into the Alpine world tomorrow. He's

text: Sünnet olacak. Ee, Alp pusatsız olur mu hiç?
english: going to be circumcised. Well, how could Alp be without weapons?
…he would have made Turalı's first weapon .

text: Şimdi bu görev bana düşer beyim.
english: Now this task falls to me, sir.
I pity the enemy who will become the Angel of Death. May the voice of injustice, the wrath of those who oppose it, come from a brave

text: Senin gibi yiğidin elinde haksızlığın sesi olsun…

english: …and give soul to the fire. The
weapons he made brought death upon the infidels.
Oh, you big, crazy Demir! That's

text: İyi o hâl Turgut. Bakalım Deli Demir bize neler öğretmiş.
english: good then, Turgut. Let's see what Crazy Demir has taught us.
Thank you, sir. Let's begin then.
“The steel mountain so vast the sun cannot circle”
“The golden mountain the moon cannot circle”
“The mighty tree that the axe cannot cut”
“The white bow, owner of the blazing fire”
“My earth water with a thousand ears”

english: we fought and roamed, where we took so much blood…

text: …nice kan döktüğümüz bu topraklar kutumuz olsun.
english: …where we shed so much blood, be our sacred treasure .

text: Hanlar Hanı Cengiz Han’ın yolundan giden yiğit nökerlerim…
english: valiant warriors, who follow in the footsteps of Genghis Khan, the Khan of Khans…
…we have come to these lands for revenge.

text: Han için kanımız sana feda olsun!
english: For the Khan, we will sacrifice our blood for you! May

text: …yokluğunuzla çöl rüzgârları gibi savrulur, Emir Saadettin.
english: …and is scattered like desert winds in your absence, Emir Saadettin.

text: Siz bir bahri ummansınız. Sizin himmetinizle biz şair kullarınıza da…
english: You are a vast ocean. With your support, we, your humble poet servants, are also granted the blessing of

text: …bahri ummanda bir damla olmak nasip olur.
english: being a drop in the vast ocean . Are

text: …tebaanız hile ve desise mi yaparlar da…
english: plotting and scheming to cause a great uproar against you,
Your Highness, that you are so angry?

text: Biliriz ki adaletinizin kılıcından nasiplerini alacaklardır.
english: We know they will receive their share of the sword of your justice.
Justice is the shadow of revenge.
Greatness is not about holding a high position...
Take your revenge properly so that you may be glorified.

text: "İntikam en tatlı aşığın nefesi kadar sıcak"
english: "Revenge is as warm as the breath of the sweetest lover," "

text: "Evladın omzuna başını koyması kadar masum intikam"
english: Revenge is as innocent as a child resting their head on your shoulder."

text: Daha önce hiç duymamıştım böyle muhteşem dizeleri.
english: I had never heard such magnificent lines before.

text: Kim bu büyük şair Emir Hazretleri?
english: Who is this great poet, Emir Hazretleri?
Go ahead and eat your meal. Do not refrigerate.
Thank goodness your fever has gone down, sir.

text: Ertuğrul Bey’im kellesini obanın ortasında savurdu.
english: Ertuğrul Bey threw his head in the middle of the camp.
Gündoğdu, I have something to tell you.
I will give you a child.

text: Bunca acının üstüne rabbimin nasip ettiği bu evlat…
english: suffering, this child that my Lord has blessed me with…

text: …büyüyüp sana yaraşır bir yiğit olacak, bilirim.
english: …will grow up to be a valiant young man worthy of you , I know. Is that even possible

text: Asıl senin gibi bir anaya yakışır evlat olacak.
english: worthy of a mother like you .
Hey brother, what are you thinking about like that? What

text: Derdimin dermanı sende ne arar kardeş?
english: cure for my ailment can I find in you, brother?

text: Benim derdim gönül meselesidir, dövülecek ayı meselesi değil.
english: My problem is a matter of the heart, not about beating up a bear.

text: Yahu kardeş, öyle kestirip atmayasın hemen. Biz ilim ehliyizdir.
english: Come on brother, don't dismiss it so quickly. We are people of knowledge.

text: Ne diyorsun kardeş ya? Ne ilimi, ne ehli?
english: What are you talking about, bro? Neither knowledgeable nor qualified?
Brother, please tell us, tell us.
Tell me about it, brother. I'm going to ask

I didn't understand, brother, what am I supposed to say? What is it that

text: Gönlüm alev aldı, intizarın beni yaktı kavurdu.

will continue like this. You will say…

text: …bakışların bir ok gibi gönlümü delip geçti.
english: …your gaze pierced my heart like an arrow.

text: Kardeş, sen bunları nereden biliyorsun ya?
english: Brother, where did you learn all this?
Knowledge, my brother, knowledge. There is
no questioning those who are knowledgeable. As
you shouldn't look at the one who speaks, brother, but at the one who makes them speak.
You have to look at who's making them say it, brother.

text: Bu şifayı yaraya iyice süreceksin Banı Çiçek Hatun.

you, Doğan Alp. It's good. Hopefully, she will get better

text: Artık Bey’in verdiği şifayla daha iyi olacak inşallah.
english: now with the healing treatment provided by Bey .
Çiçek Hatun, your heart has set me on fire.

text: Nasıl bir göz varsa artık sende…
english: What kind of eyes do you have...
...they pierced my heart like an arrow.
… and I have fallen into it.

text: Sen bir çöl gibisin, ben de sende kayboldum.
english: You are like a desert, and I am lost in you.
What do you say, Doğan Alp?

text: Vallahi ben de bilmiyorum ki ne diyorum.
english: Honestly, I don't even know what I'm saying .

text: Ben böyle lafları bilmem Çiçek Hatun.
english: I don't know how to use such words, Çiçek Hatun.
I want you to be my wife, Bani Çiçek.
I want you to accept me as your husband.

text: …o halde canına can, gönlüne derman olurum.
english: …then I will be life to your soul, solace to your heart. From now on,

text: Bundan gayrı senin çadırın, benim sarayım…
english: your tent will be my palace…
Your sorrow is my sustenance, your joy is my spring.
My life will be your life.
I didn't understand. When I asked you if you would be my

text: Sen şimdi bana hatunum olur musun dedim diye he dedin değil mi?
…ben, hatunum olur musun dedim, sen he dedin yani?
english: said, "Will you be my woman?" and you said yes, right?
-So you said you'll be my wife? -Yes, Doğan Alp. Then I'll go and tell my husband what happened

text: O vakit ben gidip beyime diyeyim böyle böyle diye.
Ki benim Ertuğrul Bey’im gelip seni Tuğtekin Bey’inden istesin o vakit.
english: my Ertuğrul Bey will come and ask for your hand from Tuğtekin Bey.
Artuk Bey said you needed to rest.

text: Acıkınca da tekmeleri pek bir sert oluyor.
english: When it's hungry, its kicks are really powerful. I

text: Hem böyle hayırlı bir günde sizinle birlikte olmak isterim.
english: would love to be with you on such an auspicious day.

text: Ertuğrul Bey’im, Doğan Alp sizi görmek ister.
english: Ertuğrul Bey, Doğan Alp wishes to see you.

text: Bir haller olmuş belli ki. Yerinde duramaz.
english: Something's clearly wrong. He can't sit still. Let

text: Beyim, müsaadenle bir dileğim olacak senden.
english: Sir, with your permission, I have a request for you.

text: De hele Doğan, nedir bu halin?
english: Hey Doğan, what's wrong with you?
The cure for my ailment lies with you, my lord .
You know, Banı Çiçek and I…

text: Ne vakit isteyelim Tuğtekin Bey’imizden Banı Çiçek Hatun'u?
english: When should we ask Mr. Tuğtekin for Banı Çiçek Hatun’s hand in marriage?

text: Hayme Ana’mla sen ne vakit dilersen beyim.
english: Hayme Ana and I can see each other .
Good morning my baby. We'll ask Mr.

text: Bahara da iki aşığın kavuşmasıyla gireriz.
english: We also enter spring with the reunion of two lovers. May
God be pleased with you, sir.
Thank God the village has been cleansed of traitors. From

text: Bundan gayrı hey şey güzel olacak.
english: now on, everything will be fine. Isn't that right,

text: Artuk Bey beni tez vakitte sünnet edecek ve bana ilk pusatımı verecek.
english: Artuk Bey will circumcise me soon and give me my first weapon.
Look at my Turali Alp! What a

text: Yahu kardeşler, bu huzur güzel şeymiş vallahi.
english: Wow brothers and sisters, this peace is a wonderful thing, honestly.

text: Ben de bundan gayrı tahsilime daha fazla devam edeceğim.
english: I will continue my education from now on.

text: Söyle bakalım, yok mudur bize nasihatlerin?
english: Tell me, don't you have any advice for us? We
would like to benefit from his knowledge.

text: Kardeş, ilim ehline yakışan anlatarak değil…
english: Brother, it 's not by explaining that a scholar is needed...
...is to give advice based on experience.

text: Bamsı Alp, biz garip dervişlerin duygusuna tercüman olmuştur.
english: Bamsı Alp has become the interpreter of the feelings of us strange dervishes .
Brother, digesting the truth is a difficult task.

text: Hakikate talip olan kişinin beti benzi soluktur.
english: The person who seeks the truth has a pale complexion.

text: İlim ehli için safa az, cefa boldur kardeşim.
english: For those who seek knowledge, there is little joy and much suffering, my brother. Uh huh.

text: Ben de Bamsı neden böyle bir deri bir kemik kaldı derim.
english: I also wonder why Bamsi is so thin, just skin and bones.

text: Bu tahsil hayatı beni zafiyete düşürmüştür.
english: This academic life has weakened me.
Brother, I need to eat. Is there

text: Merak etmeyesin, sana koca bir kuzu keseceğim.
english: n't worry, I'll butcher a whole lamb for you. Cut
it out, brother, cut it out.
Slaughter a ram, slaughter a lamb.

text: Bamsı Alp’im, sen neden ilim öğrenmek istersin?
english: Bamsi Alp, why do you want to learn knowledge?
Brother, God has addressed us directly.
He revealed the Holy Quran to us.
Now, if I don't read it... I would be

text: Banı Çiçek hatunum olmayı kabul etti kardeşler.
english: Bani Çiçek has agreed to be my wife .

text: Yarın Hayme Ana ile Ertuğrul Bey’im gidip Tuğtekin Bey’den isteyecekler.
english: Tomorrow, Hayme Ana and Ertuğrul Bey will go and ask Tuğtekin Bey for her hand in marriage.
Come here, you rascal! Wow! In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the
Peace be upon you. Wa alaikum assalam

english: eat from my mother's cooking won't find healing...

text: …Sungur kardeşim iyi bilir, biz de kalktık geldik.
english: My brother Sungur knows this well, so we got up and came here.
-Welcome, my daughter. -Nice to meet you, mother.
. In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
(Abdurrahman) Do you have permission, Hayme Ana?
Come here, Abdurrahman. A messenger brought news from

text: Hayme Ana, Dündar Bey’im ve Yiğit Alp’ten haber getirdi bir ulak.
english: Hayme Ana, Dündar Bey, and Yiğit Alp . They'll be here in

text: Kısmetse birkaç güne kadar burada olacaklarmış.

english: I will sit at the same table with my children. Knowing that

text: Göç vakti geldiğinde evlatlarımın yanımda olduğunu bilmek var ya…
english: my children are with me when the time comes to migrate …
…makes me fear nothing anymore. The betrayal that

text: Damarlarımızdaki kanı kurutan ihanet de bitmiştir gayrı.
english: dried the blood in our veins has finally come to an end . May

text: Bu bahar bize huzur ve adalet getirsin inşallah.
english: this spring bring us peace and justice, God willing.
Sir. I don't want any more

text: Gayrı aramızda bir sır kalsın istemem.
Her sır dönüp dolaşıp dağlanmış yaralarımızı daha da kanatır.
english: Every secret, in the end, only makes our already scarred wounds bleed even more.
What other secrets do you have, Gökçe?
would spread curses throughout the tribe, just like Gümüştekin.
My brother Ertuğrul was seriously wounded. While he

text: Ölümle cebelleşirken bu adam onu öldürmeye geldi.
english: was struggling with death, this man came to kill him.
While trying to protect my Ertuğrul Bey…
…he severely wounded me with his dagger. I fear
...will take my womanhood from me, sir . From not being able to give

text: ...Tüccar Abdullah, Tebriz’den gelmiş. Size mühim haberleri varmış.
english: ...Merchant Abdullah has come from Tabriz. They have some important news for you. Is

text: Al onu içeriye. Ama üstünü iyice ara.
english: Bring it inside. But search him thoroughly. Don't leave a single

text: Üzerinde pusat namına tek şey bırakma. Hadi.

english: (Sound of swords being drawn) There was

text: Bu kadar tedbire gerek yoktu Saadettin.
english: no need for so many precautions, Saadettin. I have cast into the blessed waters

text: Geçmişte bana ettiklerini Amuderya’nın kutlu suyuna atıp öyle geldim.
english: of the Amudarya River all those who wronged me in the past, and that is why I have come here.
I heard Ögeday expelled you from his army. As if that

text: Yetmemiş, bir de başına ödül koymuş.
english: wasn't enough, they've also put a bounty on his head.
…cut the head of the dog you trusted so much …
(Sound of a sword striking the ground)
n't you afraid I'll kill you?
Oh, Saadettin, oh. I have all the letters you

text: Bugüne kadar bana yazdığın bütün mektuplar elimde.
english: 've written to me so far . What do you think would happen if

text: O mektupları sultanın görürse ne olur dersin?
Tek başına yapacaksın ha o işi?
english: you're going to do that job all by yourself, huh? I

text: Duydum. Ögeday’ın ordusundan attığı birkaç çapulcuyla gezermişsin.
english: I heard. You apparently used to wander around with a few bandits that Ögeday had thrown out of his army .

text: Adamlarım Moğol ordusunun en acımasız katilleri.
english: My men are the most ruthless killers in the Mongol army. And then there's
What's going through your head, Noyan?
My men want plunder, they want loot. They're

text: Sen de bu topraklarda huzurun bozulmasını istemezsin.
english: wouldn't want the peace to be disturbed in these lands either. You

text: Ne adamlarımın ganimet için obalara saldırmasını istersin…
english: neither want my men to raid the settlements for plunder…

text: …ne de Ertuğrul için gönderdiğin askerler yüzünden…
english: nor do you want the Kayı and Dodurga tribes to revolt because of the soldiers you sent for Ertuğrul. We
I will bring you his head.

text: Ertuğrul’la yarım kalan hesabımı bitirmek isterim Emir Hazretleri.
english: I wish to settle my unfinished business with Ertuğrul, Your Highness.
the men fight not for gold…
I always satisfy their appetite. Just

text: Yeter ki sen bana Ertuğrul’un kellesini getir.
english: bring me Ertuğrul's head. My duty is

text: Bana düşen de iki obanın senin yüzünden birleşen yollarını kesmektir.
english: to cut off the roads that have merged between the two tribes because of you. I
will descend upon them like a nightmare.

text: Yaşadıkları her gün onlara azap olacak.
english: Every day they live will be torture for them.

text: Sizi görmek isteyen bir hanım var.
english: a lady who wants to see you .
Who is it? His Highness the Emir

text: Adının Goncagül olduğunu söyler Emir Hazretleri.
…sana bu altınlardan çok daha kıymetli bir hediye vereceğim Noyan.
english: …I will give you a gift far more valuable than these gold coins, Noyan.
My son, are you alright? I wish to

text: Halam ve babamın intikamını almak isterim Emir Hazretleri.
english: avenge my aunt and my father, Your Highness. I have no one else

text: Gayrı sizden başka kimsem yoktur artık.
english: but you now. I am at your service
until the end of my life .

text: Saadettin Köpek bundan gayrı bize daha çok musallat olacaktır.
english: Saadettin Köpek will cause us even more trouble from now on.
Therefore, I say… let’s continue our unity with the

text: …önümüzdeki bahara kadar Dodurgalılarla birliğimize devam edelim.
english: people of Dodurga until next spring .

text: Selcan Hatun ile Halime Hatun marifetlerini gösterir, kilimlerimizi satarız.
english: Selcan Hatun and Halime Hatun showcase their skills , and we sell our carpets.

text: Alp olma yaşına gelmiş yiğitlerimiz var, onları yetiştiririz.
english: We have brave young men who have reached the age to become warriors; we will train them.

text: Derim ki bunu da en kısa vakitte toyda istişare edelim.
english: I suggest we discuss this at the party as soon as possible.

text: Ana, bu göç vakti geldiğinde senin aklında bir yer var mıdır göçmek için?
english: Mother, when this time of migration comes, do you have a place in mind to migrate to?

text: Ama tez vakitte beylerimle oturup bu meseleyi istişare etmek isterim.
english: But I would like to sit down with my lords soon and discuss this matter with them.

text: Ertuğrul kardeşim, senin aklında bir yer var mı?
english: Brother Ertuğrul, do you have a place in mind? I would like to go, brother, to

text: …Kayı’nın köklerinin salınacağı topraklara gitmek isterim ağabey.
english: the lands where the roots of Kayı will take root, together with those sitting at this table . To the lands where
our sons and daughters can recite Fatiha for us after we are gone…
to the lands where our graves lie.

text: İnşallah o yere hep birlikte karar vereceğiz.
english: Hopefully, we will all decide on that location together.

text: Ne güzel dedin kardeşim. İnşallah, inşallah.
english: great point, brother. God willing, God willing.

text: Hayme Ana’m, müsaaden olursa size birkaç şey söylemek isterim.
english: Mother Hayme, if you'll allow me, I'd like to tell you a few things.

text: Obamız ne vakit nereye gider bilmem.
english: I don't know when or where our tribe will go.

text: Lakin gittiğimiz topraklara sımsıkı tutunalım isterim.
english: But I want us to hold on tightly to the lands we go to.
Let's hold on so that Halime and
I can both raise our children in our own homeland. Wow!

text: İnşallah bu sefer kucağına bebemizi vereceğim.
english: Hopefully this time I'll be able to give her our baby to hold.
Thank God. You have granted me the blessing of being together with

text: Ölmeden bütün evlatlarımla bir arada olmayı nasip ettin.
english: all my children before I die .
Our burden is heavy, our task is difficult.
Our strength hangs by a thread. May
He make it beneficial on the path of righteousness.
it illuminate the light of Kayı. May
it shine so that… it may bring light to the lonely and
helpless in the darkness . May He keep

text: Gücümüzü, kuvvetimizi, aklımızı, kelamımızı eğriden uzak tutsun.
english: our strength, our power, our minds, and our words away from falsehood. May God
protect us from the evil of immaturity and excess. May it
not separate us from our religion and traditions.
Let's not forget where we came from and where we are going.

text: Bizleri Atam Oğuz’un kutlu yolundan ayrı koymasın.
english: not separate us from the blessed path of our ancestor Oğuz.
God, don't separate us from each other.
Make us one. Make them strong and

text: Sen bizi birbirimize sevgiyle, muhabbetle bağla yarabbim.
english: us together with love and affection .
